dublinCore.dc:title: 112 HR 3806 IH: Great Smoky Mountains National Park Agreement Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meadows introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize payment of funds in accordance with the agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley Authority, the State of North Carolina, Swain County, North Carolina, and the United States Department of the Interior.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Great Smoky Mountains National Park Agreement Act of 2013.

From funds previously appropriated to the National Park Service in the construction account for that agency in the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2012 (Public Law 112â€“74), the National Park Service shall expend $4,000,000 for payment consistent with the Memorandum of Agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley Authority, the State of North Carolina, Swain County, North Carolina, and the United States Department of the Interior, dated February, 2010, that supersedes the agreement of July 30, 1943 (relating to the construction of the North Shore Road from the eastern boundary of Great Smoky Mountains National Park).
